genre: 英検 3級 中級レベル

questions.question: My friend is worried because she ___ her keys.
questions.explanation: 最近失くした状態が続いているため、現在完了形'has lost'が正しい。

questions.question: If you study hard, you ___ the exam.
questions.explanation: If節内は現在形、主節未来形。'will pass'が正しい。

questions.question: She suggested that I ___ earlier to the meeting.
questions.explanation: 'suggest that'の後は原形。'come'が正い。

questions.question: The company was founded ___ 1990.
questions.explanation: 年号は'in'で示す。'in 1990'が標準。

questions.question: I wish I _____ more money to travel.
questions.explanation: wish節内は仮定法過去。'had'が正しい。

questions.question: She has been working here ___ five years.
questions.explanation: 期間は'for'で示す。'for five years'が正しい。

questions.question: The movie was so boring that I almost fell _____.
questions.explanation: 'fell asleep'で'眠りに落ちた'。'asleep'は形容詞。

questions.question: She doesn't mind _____ late.
questions.explanation: 'don't mind + V-ing'で'~するのは構わない'。

questions.question: I would have gone if I _____ about the party.
questions.explanation: 仮定法過去完了。'would have gone'に対応して'had known'。

questions.question: He is known _____ his excellent teaching skills.
questions.explanation: 'be known for'で'~で知られている'。

questions.question: The two cars are almost _____, but this one is bigger.
questions.explanation: 'similar'は述語形容詞。'alike'と同義。

questions.question: He succeeded in _____ a doctor without much difficulty.
questions.explanation: 'succeed in + V-ing'で'~するのに成功する'。

questions.question: Unless you call me, I _____ that you are coming.
questions.explanation: 'Unless'は'if not'の意味。未来形'won't know'。

questions.question: The game was cancelled _____ the bad weather.
questions.explanation: 名詞が続くなら'because of'。'bad weather'の前。

questions.question: Can you help me _____ this problem?
questions.explanation: 'help + 原形'で'~するのを手伝う'。

questions.question: I'm interested _____ learning new languages.
questions.explanation: 'be interested in'で'~に興味がある'。

questions.question: The students are busy _____ for the exam.
questions.explanation: 'be busy + V-ing'で'~するのに忙しい'。

questions.question: She made a _____ mistake in the exam.
questions.explanation: 'mistake'の前は形容詞'careless'。

questions.question: The book was ___ interesting that I finished it in one day.
questions.explanation: 'so + 形容詞 + that'で'とても~なので'。

questions.question: I haven't seen Tom ___ he left for America.
questions.explanation: 'since'で時の起点。'~して以来ずっと'という完了形。

questions.question: The patient felt much ___ after taking the medicine.
questions.explanation: 'feel'の後の形容詞で'better'は比較級。'much better'で'ずっと良い'。

questions.question: Despite ___ hard, he failed the exam.
questions.explanation: 'Despite + V-ing'で'~にもかかわらず'。

questions.question: The manager encouraged his staff ___ new ideas.
questions.explanation: 'encourage + 目的語 + to不定詞'で'~するよう勇気づける'。

questions.question: The weather was so bad that we decided to postpone the _____.
questions.explanation: 'decide to postpone'は'延期する'。'event'（行事）がふさわしい。

questions.question: She is ___ popular singer in our country.
questions.explanation: 最高級。'the most popular'で'最も有名な'。

questions.question: I'm looking forward to _____ you soon.
questions.explanation: 'look forward to + V-ing'で'~をいまから楽しみにしている'。

questions.question: The house needs _____.
questions.explanation: 'need + V-ing'で受動的な意味。'needs repairing'で'修理が必要'。

questions.question: What would you do if you _____ a million dollars?
questions.explanation: 仮定法過去。If節に過去形'won'。

questions.question: It's possible that she _____ the news by now.
questions.explanation: 'by now'（今までに）で現在完了形'has heard'。

questions.question: The film was so _____ that most people fell asleep.
questions.explanation: 映画が退屈'boring'。'bored'は人の感情。

questions.question: She worked so hard that she _____ her health.
questions.explanation: 'ruin one's health'で'健康を損なう'は慣用句。

questions.question: The accident happened _____ I was crossing the street.
questions.explanation: 'when'は瞬間。'while'は継続。街を渡り始めた瞬間なので'when'。

questions.question: The article is written _____ a famous journalist.
questions.explanation: 受動態で行為者は'by'で示す。'written by'。

questions.question: She told me that she _____ her job.
questions.explanation: 過去の報告で、仮定またはその直後の計画は'would'で表示。

questions.question: He made an apology _____ breaking the vase.
questions.explanation: 'apologize for'で'~についてお詫びする'。'make an apology for'。

questions.question: _____ he was tired, he didn't give up.
questions.explanation: 'Although'で譲歩。'tired'にもかかわらず諦めなかった。

questions.question: The teacher explained the lesson _____ all students understood.
questions.explanation: 'so that'で目的を表す『~するために』。

questions.question: The concert will be held _____ next Saturday.
questions.explanation: 曜日は'on'。'on Saturday'。

questions.question: I can't remember the name of the person _____ I met yesterday.
questions.explanation: 目的語の関係代名詞'that'。省略可能。

questions.question: If I _____ your advice, I wouldn't have failed.
questions.explanation: 仮定法過去完了。'would have failed'ならIf節は'had taken'。

questions.question: They are arguing _____ where to go for vacation.
questions.explanation: 'argue about'で『~について議論する』。

questions.question: The city has been developing _____ a rapid pace.
questions.explanation: 'at a rapid pace'で『急速なペースで』。'at'が速度・比率。

questions.question: She speaks French as _____ as English.
questions.explanation: 'as fluently as'で『英語と同じくらい流暢に』。副詞。

questions.question: The storm caused terrible _____ to the coastal areas.
questions.explanation: 'cause damage'で『被害をもたらす』。'damage'は不可算。

questions.question: He spent hours _____ for his lost dog.
questions.explanation: 'spend time + V-ing'で『~するのに時間をかける』。

questions.question: The two friends hadn't seen each other _____ ten years.
questions.explanation: 現在完了形'haven't seen'で期間は'for'。'for ten years'。

questions.question: She was wearing a blue dress _____ a red hat.
questions.explanation: 'wearing + 衣類'の受け身的な別衣類は'with'。'with a red hat'。

questions.question: The price of the product has increased _____ 50%.
questions.explanation: 増加量は'by'。'increased by 50%'。

questions.question: It's about time you _____ home.
questions.explanation: 'It's about time + 過去形'で『もう~すべき頃だ』という仮定法。

questions.question: The factory is _____ to be closed next month.
questions.explanation: 'be likely to'で『~である可能性が高い』。
